titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for duty-free treatment of oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers for use in aircraft brake components.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/19/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment of acrylic or modacrylic: oxidized polyacrylonitrile fibers for use in the production of aircraft brake components.
